page.title: 12A MARRIED MINISTER
page.content: From 1842 until 1957 the church never had a married minister_115 years,but the present minister, Rev. Alex. Burgess B.A. (married with a family) has been minister of the High Kirk for 28 years.The beautiful stained glass windows in the church are there as a war memorial.There are many marble and brass plaques in memory of past ministers and also in memory of those who died in the two world wars.Beside the church stands the manse which was built in 1874.Beside this stands the modern church halls.Built in 1970 there are in use 6 or 7 days a week throughout the year.Girls'brigade,B0ys' Brigade, Young Women's Group, Badminton, to name but a few uses.
